ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.Lab.SaveFailed: Condition Lab failed to Save and Close
ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.PreventativeSaveRemi: Custom Token Statuses | Preventative Save Reminder

To prevent some issues arising from the migration to Active Effects, please open the Condition Lab and click the Save Mapping button if you haven't already done so.

This will ensure your Condition Map is converted correctly.
